pageProps.title: ReactNativeAssetsPluginConfig
pageProps.md:
Interface: ReactNativeAssetsPluginConfig

ReactNativeAssetsPlugin configuration options.

Hierarchy

  • ReactNativeAssetResolverConfig

    ↳ ReactNativeAssetsPluginConfig

Table of contents

Properties

  • context

  • devServerEnabled

  • outputPath

  • platform

  • test

Properties

context

• context: string

Context in which all resolution happens. Usually it's project root directory.

Defined in: src/webpack/plugins/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin.ts:14

devServerEnabled

• Optional devServerEnabled: undefined | boolean

Whether the development server is enabled.

Defined in: src/webpack/plugins/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin.ts:23

outputPath

• Optional outputPath: undefined | string

Output directory where all the assets and bundle will be saved. If not provided, it will be inferred based on output.path from Webpack configuration.

Defined in: src/webpack/plugins/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin.ts:19

platform

• platform: string

Target application platform.

Defined in: src/webpack/plugins/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin/ReactNativeAssetResolver.ts:17

test

• Optional test: undefined | RegExp

Override default test RegExp. If the asset matches the test RegExp, it will be process by the custom React Native asset resolver. Otherwise, the resolution will process normally and the asset will be handled by Webpack.

Defined in: src/webpack/plugins/ReactNativeAssetsPlugin/ReactNativeAssetResolver.ts:15
